Entries.Eloise: Did you know a hen lays around 530 eggs in her lifetime!
Entries.Jacob: Hello @. Eloise loves birds, but she's never been particularly interested in the egg hunt. Probably because Abigail always wins.

Entries.Eloise: Dancing's so silly! I hope we haven't scared all the birds away.
Entries.Jacob: Hello @. Just grabbing a little space to myself.
Hello @. Just hanging out here with my good buddy Coppernicus.

Entries.Eloise: The jellyfish are so cool! Did you know that jellyfish don't have a brain? And they don't have a heart either!#$b#Also, they're not fish. They're actually Medusozoa.
Entries.Jacob: Hello @! I hope Ellie hasn't chatted your ears off with jellyfish facts. There's a part of me that loves the mystery that surrounds them.

Entries.Eloise: Miss Juliet's hat is so silly! Jellyfish don't have eyes!

Do you know why these chickens are so tame, farmer @?#$b#It's cos when birds hatch, they think the first thing they see is their mom. It's called 'imprinting'.$3#$b#So Marnie's their mother chicken!$1
Entries.Jacob: These chickens look very healthy. Compliments to Ms. Marnie and Shane for raising them well.#$b#They're nicely socialized too.

Entries.Eloise: Oh, why can't we go in the maze! We'll look after each other. Puh-lease Dad.$5
Entries.Jacob: I know, I look ridiculous. Eloise is extremely persuasive.$5
Entries.Marnie: Dr Jacob won't believe me when I tell him he's looking very smart in that outfit.

Entries.Eloise: Hi farmer @! You should ask my Dad to dance.#$b#He never dances with anyone but me. I think he misses Mom too much.$2
Entries.Jacob: Ask someone to dance? Oh, I couldn't possibly!$4

Entries.Eloise: Are you gonna enter the competition, farmer @? I don't like fishing. Fish have feelings too you know!$2
Entries.Jacob: Hello @. We're here for the company and the snowmen, not the competition.#$b#I'm sorry, but catch and release fishing feels somewhat barbaric to me.

Entries.Eloise: Happy Winter Star! What do you think's in this one? It's REALLY big. And heavy!#$b#Hey, I found this and thought you might like it.[444 392 394]
Entries.Jacob: Hello @. Happy Winter Star. Jodi has been gracious enough to invite me to join her family.#$b#Now if only I could drag Ellie away from the presents!
